Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Kostner
ShortDescription: #70 Division buses are temp. rerouted in both directions via Division, Kostner, North Avenue, Cicero and Division due to police activity near Division/Kostner.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Division, Kostner, North Avenue, Cicero, then resume their normal route on Division due to police activity near Division/Kostner.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #62 Archer &  #62H Archer/Harlem Temporary Reroute at Archer/Harlem
ShortDescription: #62 Archer &  #62H Archer/Harlem buses are rr via Archer, Austin, 63rd & Archer Road (63rdW Terminal), due to a parade/festival near Archer/Harlem.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#62 Archer and  #62H Archer/Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Archer, Austin, 63rd, Archer Road (63rdW Terminal), then resume their normal route, due to a parade/festival near Archer/Harlem.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #55N 55th/Narragansett Temporary Reroute at Archer/Harlem
ShortDescription: #55N 55th/Narragansett buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th, Austin, 63rd, Narragansett, 63rd & into the Terminal, due to a parade/festival nr Archer/Harlem.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#55N 55th/Narragansett buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 55th, Austin, 63rd, Narragansett, 63rd and into the Terminal, then resume their normal route due to a parade/festival near Archer/Harlem.

Allow extra travel time.
